content:
# The error indicates that I do not have enough iron plates to craft the burner mining drill. 
# This is unexpected since I had just produced 1 iron plate. 
# It seems that I did not extract the iron plate from the furnace after it was produced.

# I need to extract the iron plate from the furnace's inventory before proceeding with crafting the drill.

# Let's extract the iron plate from the furnace.
extract_item(Prototype.IronPlate, furnace.position, quantity=1)  # Extracting 1 iron plate

# Now, I will check my inventory again to confirm that I have the iron plate.
print(f"Inventory after extracting the iron plate: {inspect_inventory()}") 

# After confirming, I will proceed to craft the burner mining drill.
assert inspect_inventory().get(Prototype.IronPlate, 0) >= 1, "Not enough iron plates to craft a burner mining drill"
assert inspect_inventory().get(Prototype.Wood, 0) >= 5, "Not enough wood to craft a burner mining drill"

# Now I will craft the burner mining drill.
craft_item(Prototype.BurnerMiningDrill)  # Crafting the burner mining drill

# Checking inventory after crafting
print(f"Inventory after crafting the burner mining drill: {inspect_inventory()}")
